channel.title: How to bot in Silkroad Online
channel.description:
I was bored waiting for the server to be less populated sooo.. I went to write this tutorial..
[b] What you will need to follow this to tutorial [/b] [*] iSROBot [*] HaxCr4x 3.1
(Links to all of these given at the end of the TuT)
[b]For the first method.[/b]
1. Open HaxCr4x 3.1, it will look something like this.
[IMG]http://img513.imageshack.us/img513/5707/haxcrax1eu2.png[/img]
2. Then you will have to open iSROBot, You may or may not get a TCP Error .. Ignore it.. After you open it, a little white finger opens on your system tray..
[IMG]http://img239.imageshack.us/img239/956/tcpqz1.png[/img]
[IMG]http://img503.imageshack.us/img503/455/isrobotkh5.png[/img]
3. Ok now you have iSROBot open.. Go ahead and right click the little finger and click "Start Game". ( You must have a edited client) (Look at bottom) But before you click it. Go to HaxCr4x and under Auto Crack click "Enabled"
[IMG]http://img114.imageshack.us/img114/4411/dystygw7.png[/img]
[IMG]http://img115.imageshack.us/img115/4161/enabledoi0.png[/img]
4. Now you can run Silkroad, You will notice that the bar is going up.. The status should also change to "Connected"
[IMG]http://img504.imageshack.us/img504/8853/goingcr6.png[/img]
5. If you did everything correctly you should have the game running and the bar on HaxCr4x full.
6. So now you logged in and your in game.. But how do I start this bot? Well first press "HOME" You'll be in the General tab. Here are the settings I use..
[IMG]http://img266.imageshack.us/img266/1879/generalhh8.png[/img]
Basic Explaning Auto Picking - Picks up your items.. Delay before starting picking - amount of time before picking up a drop. Pick First - Pick up a drop before fighting another monster Reject Trade Request - Rejects trade requests from other players. Don't pick money - Doesn't pick the money up Back Town When Died - Goes back to town option when dead
Dont worry about anything else.. You cracked it so it doesn't matter..
Now the Protection tab.. and again my settings..
[IMG]http://img519.imageshack.us/img519/5736/protectionpq1.png[/img]
Well this is self explanitory.. On the rest of these I'm just going to post my settings..
Auto Training
[IMG]http://img526.imageshack.us/img526/5697/autotraineq8.png[/img] NO MATTER WHAT, Loop all bot activity MUST be checked.
Loop
[IMG]http://img113.imageshack.us/img113/1482/loopss0.png[/img]
Team
[IMG]http://img113.imageshack.us/img113/4776/teambz9.png[/img]
Filter
[IMG]http://img337.imageshack.us/img337/7940/filterbt5.png[/img]
Chat
[IMG]http://img337.imageshack.us/img337/7940/filterbt5.png[/img]
If you do have any problems with the settings just post..
7. Click Auto Train and have fun outside .. or inside the house.. Just not wasting your fucking life on the computer..
O yes I should mention that you can multi task with this on.. You can have silkroad minimized and this will still work..
People bot 24/7 and in a week there over lvl 30.. You can do that.. But that would be abusing and unfair to legits..
How to install the edited client
1. Go to your silkroad folder.. Normally C:\Program Files\Silkroad 2. Backup sro_Client.exe by renaming it.. 3. Drag sro_client.exe (Edited one) into C:\Program Files\Silkroad
Downloads ALL uploaded by Me.
[url=http://www.mediafire.com/?0db3jynudnk] HaxCr4x 3.1[/url] [url=http://www.mediafire.com/?3w3pjn1znkd]iSROBot 1.66[/url] [url=http://www.mediafire.com/?9mvzsj0jstm] Edited Client[/url]

item.title: How to bot in Silkroad Online
item.dc:creator: @FastBallz FastBawlz
item.description:
@FastBallz wrote:

LegendScape:

I play silkroad and they got so many bot cathing things it aint even funny.

Actually… They suck at catching bots…

Deepblue7 is about to update there server capacity from 1,000 to 40,000…

The capacity of all the servers in Silkroad is 60,000…

Yea…

item.title: How to bot in Silkroad Online
item.dc:creator: @LegendScape LegendScape
item.description:
@LegendScape wrote:

haha i have heard questions like you wouldnt believe…

i sent a link to someone once on IM they responded…
them “whats that?”
me “it’s a link . . .”
them “what do i do with it”
me " . . . you click it . . ."
them “now what”
me “yeah i think we are done here goodbye”

Read full topic

item.title: How to bot in Silkroad Online
item.dc:creator: @FastBallz FastBawlz
item.description:
@FastBallz wrote:

I was bored waiting for the server to be less populated sooo… I went to write this tutorial…

What you will need to follow this to tutorial
[] iSROBot
[] HaxCr4x 3.1

(Links to all of these given at the end of the TuT)

For the first method.

  1. Open HaxCr4x 3.1, it will look something like this.

  2. Then you will have to open iSROBot, You may or may not get a TCP Error … Ignore it…
    After you open it, a little white finger opens on your system tray…

  3. Ok now you have iSROBot open… Go ahead and right click the little finger and click “Start Game”. ( You must have a edited client) (Look at bottom)
    But before you click it. Go to HaxCr4x and under Auto Crack click “Enabled”

  4. Now you can run Silkroad, You will notice that the bar is going up… The status should also change to “Connected”

  5. If you did everything correctly you should have the game running and the bar on HaxCr4x full.

  6. So now you logged in and your in game… But how do I start this bot? Well first press “HOME”
    You’ll be in the General tab. Here are the settings I use…

    Basic Explaning
    Auto Picking - Picks up your items…
    Delay before starting picking - amount of time before picking up a drop.
    Pick First - Pick up a drop before fighting another monster
    Reject Trade Request - Rejects trade requests from other players.
    Don’t pick money - Doesn’t pick the money up
    Back Town When Died - Goes back to town option when dead

    Dont worry about anything else… You cracked it so it doesn’t matter…

    Now the Protection tab… and again my settings…

    Well this is self explanitory… On the rest of these I’m just going to post my settings…

    Auto Training


    NO MATTER WHAT, Loop all bot activity MUST be checked.

    Loop

    Team

    Filter

    Chat

    If you do have any problems with the settings just post…

  7. Click Auto Train and have fun outside … or inside the house… Just not wasting your fucking life on the computer…

    O yes I should mention that you can multi task with this on… You can have silkroad minimized and this will still work…

    People bot 24/7 and in a week there over lvl 30… You can do that…
    But that would be abusing and unfair to legits…

    How to install the edited client

  8. Go to your silkroad folder… Normally C:\Program Files\Silkroad

  9. Backup sro_Client.exe by renaming it…

  10. Drag sro_client.exe (Edited one) into C:\Program Files\Silkroad

    Downloads
    ALL uploaded by Me.

    HaxCr4x 3.1
    iSROBot 1.66
    Edited Client

Read full topic
item.source: How to bot in Silkroad Online
